description:
This Breakout clone has two game modes - "arcade" and "free play ".

"Arcade mode" offers the infinite generation of random levels until the player loses ball, to go for a high score with online leaderboards. "Free play mode" offers 100 unique screens of bricks to destroy.
title: @Simple Series Vol. 1: The Block Kuzushi Neo

description: This is a Sudoku type game for the Nintendo Wii distributed via WiiWare. The game offers four levels of difficulty from "Beginner" to "Professional", and includes online ranking via Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.
title: @Simple Series Vol. 2: The Number Puzzle Neo

description:
This is a video game adaptation of the ancient game of Mahjong for the Nintendo Wii distributed via WiiWare. Game has five modes - Practice mode, Challenge Mode, DS interlocking mode – that allow use of Nintendo DS as game controller, Communication Battle: Friend Battle Mode and Battle Competition: National Battle Mode.

It also include nationwide ranking via Nintendo Wi-Fi connection and ability to analysis game results to improve player skills.
title: @Simple Series Vol. 3: The Mahjong

description: Typical the 'escape-the-room' kind game that takes place in an apartment of a multi-storey building. Player needs to solve different puzzles and use items to escape an apartment, and solve the mystery of what happened to the character.
title: @Simple Series Vol. 4: The Misshitsukara no Dasshutsu

description: A simple 3D judo sports simulation game for Wii. Game features 20 different fighters with unique technique and characteristics. It also support split screen gameplay for two players and worldwide/nationwide ranking via Nintendo Wi-Fi connection.
title: @Simple Series Vol. 5: The Judo

description:
Compilation consisting 11 classic table games: "Mahjong", "Shogi", "Go", "Reversi", "Gomoku", "Koi-Koi", "Hana-awase", "Daifugō", "Sevens", "Concentration" and "Solitaire".

It includes two levels of difficulty for game and additional "quiz mode".
title: Simple 2000 Series Wii Vol. 1: The Table Game

description: 250 Mannin no Kanken: Wii de Tokoton Kanji Nou is official educational Han exam software designed to improve users' Kanji skills and prepare for the Kanji/Han. It includes a big data base of different words and has multiple modes including learning, dictionary, quiz, and even writing practice tied to the Nintendo DS.
title: 250 Mannin no Kanken: Wii de Tokoton Kanji Nou
Pong Toss Pro: Frat Party Games

alternate_titles.title: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 1 - Der Schatz Unter den Wellen
One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 1 - Le Trésor Sous les Flots

description:
One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 1 - The Treasure Beneath the Waves is an action adventure game based on the One Piece anime and manga series. It is the first half of a story which is continued in the follow-up game One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2 - Awakening of a Hero. The game starts with the Straw Hat crew being caught in a storm at sea while on the Sunny when they spot a glowing orb in the sky. After getting closer Luffy is sucked in the glowing orb and is told that he must visit the four islands of Dreams and face the ordeals on them to get a fitting reward. A strange creature called Gabri acompanies the crew as they face the ordeals.

In the game, the player takes control of the members of the Straw Hat crew. These are Monkey D. Luffy, Roronoa Zoro, Nami, Usopp, Sanji, Tony Tony Chopper, Nico Robin, Franky and Brook. Various islands have to be explored and the player has to beat-up enemies including sub and end bosses. On the island, various items can be found that can either be directly used or crafted into something else. The player can also catch fish with a fishing rod, catch insects with a net and brake up rocks with a pickaxe.
title: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 1 - The Treasure Beneath the Waves

description:
Cook Wars is a cooking themed party game similar to the Cooking Mama series. The player can choose between four characters from four countries (Japan, USA, France and Italy) each with different specialties. Then you have to select a recipe to begin, here again the meals are sorted by country of origin, for example France will have Ratatouille, Crepes, Cheese Fondue and Croissants. More recipes can be unlocked as the player progress.

Mini-games have the player use the Wiimote to chop vegetables, flip crepes in a pan or crush tomatoes to make sauce etc. Score points are awarded for speed and accuracy of the players movements. Up to four players can compete with each other in multiplayer mode.
title: Cook Wars

description: With Quiz Party another trivia game comparable to Smarty Pants has been released on the Wii. Although just playable with one controller, the game is designed for players to team up. Two or four teams can be chosen with an unlimited number of team members. More than 2.000 questions from various topics such as music, science, history, geography, cinema or TV and celebrities are expected to be answered. The game offers three different game modes suitable either for a very quick round, a one that takes just up to 30 minutes or the Normal Mode lasting about an hour. In addition, the UK release is featuring the voice of TV host Roy Walker.
title: Quiz Party

description: The second installment of the Big Beach Sports series is presenting 8 outdoor activities, as there are Canoe, Cricket, Disc Golf, Dune Buggy, Water Rocket, Rugby, Soccer, and Surfing. Whilst only the latter one makes use of it the support of the Wii Balance Board is still completely new to this series. Just similar to it's predecessor players are invited to a single player mode or to accept the challenge to play against up to three friends during a multiplayer session.
title: Big Beach Sports 2

description:
Similar to Popstars: Deine Chance, the Wii game Popstars is another licensed title about this so-named German casting show. The goal of the game is to become a member of a (girls) band by singing and dancing up to 32 songs. Therefore, Wii compatible microphones are supported.

There are two game modes: With Casting, the player can expect the career mode going through challenges like performing songs as well as conducting workshops and making friends (or foes) during RPG-style conversations with competing CPU characters. Before it starts, the player is led to an editor in order to create a personal avatar. As the game aims to a female audience, only girls are editable. A quick game for in-between is offered by the second mode where songs that have been unlocked by overcoming the career mode are offered even for a multiplayer match against or in cooperation with a friend.
title: Popstars

description: Just Dance 2: Firework is downloadable content which includes new song for Just Dance 2
title: Just Dance 2: Firework

description: Just Dance 2: Crazy Christmas is downloadable content which includes new song for Just Dance 2.
title: Just Dance 2: Crazy Christmas

description: Just Dance 2: Pon De Replay is downloadable content which includes new song for Just Dance 2.
title: Just Dance 2: Pon De Replay

description: Just Dance 2: Pump Up The Volume is downloadable content which includes new song for Just Dance 2.
title: Just Dance 2: Pump Up The Volume

description: Just Dance 2: Barbie Girl is downloadable content which includes new song for Just Dance 2.
title: Just Dance 2: Barbie Girl

description:
Beyblade: Metal Fusion - Battle Fortress is an 3D action game based on the Beyblade: Metal Fusion animated series. Beybladers are abducted to a Battle fortress by an evil scientist who is after their power. Now the player takes on the role of Ginka Hagane and his Beyblade to put a stop to the scientists evil plan.

In the game the player will control a spinning tops called a Beyblade. This Beyblade has to battle other Beyblades an can do all kinds of moves and special attacks. It even includes a Star beast that can do massive damage.
title: Beyblade: Metal Fusion - Battle Fortress

description:
This One Piece compilation contains the following two games:

  • One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 1 - The Treasure Beneath the Waves
  • One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2 - Awakening of a Hero
title: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise - Double Pack

alternate_titles.title: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2 - Das Erwachen eines Helden
One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2 - L'Éveil d'un Héros

description:
One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2 - Awakening of a Hero is an action adventure game based on the One Piece anime and manga series. The game continues the story from One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 1 - The Treasure Beneath the Waves. At the end of the first game Gabri expended all of his powers to save the Straw Hat crew. The game starts with Gabri transforming into an orb and urging the crew to flee back to the ship. The crew is now determent to restore him to his former self.

In the game take control of the members of the Straw Hat crew. These are Monkey D. Luffy, Roronoa Zoro, Nami, Usopp, Sanji, Tony Tony Chopper, Nico Robin, Franky and Brook. Various islands have to be explored and the player has to beat-up enemies including sub and end bosses. On the island various items can be found that can either be directly used or crafted into something else. The player can also catch fish with a fishing rod, catch insects with a net and brake up rocks with a pickaxe.
title: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2 - Awakening of a Hero

description:
Emergency Heroes is a 3D mission-based racing game played from a third person perspective. The game takes place in a fictional city called San Alto where the players assumes the role of Zach Harper who works for an organization called Emergency Heroes led by Captain Walters.

In the game the player will drive through San Alto and takes on missions like chasing criminals, firefighting and rescuing civilians. Smaller submissions have to be taken care of while driving through the city to the bigger missions who’s locations can be found on the city map. Several cars are available like a police car or a firefighting vehicle depending on the mission.
title: Emergency Heroes

description:

description: Twinkle Queen is a 2D fighting game with girls who participate in the "Twinkle Queen Tournament". Game modes are one on one, one on many or battle royale with a maximum of 4 players.
title: Twinkle Queen

description:
MySims Collection is a compilation featuring two MySims games:

  • MySims
  • MySims Racing
title: MySims Collection

description: El Chavo is a party game for one to four players based on the Mexican animated series El Chavo Animado. Players control one of four characters from the show (Quico, Ñoño, Popis, or el Chavo) in a game structured very much like Mario Party; players move around a game board, and in between turns compete in one of 30 different minigames.
title: El Chavo

description: Takt of Magic is a game released for Wii in 2009. It is mainly developed by Taito and published by Nintendo. In the game the player will use the Wii Remote to cast spells by drawing a certain pattern. The game has yet to be released outside Japan.
title: Takt of Magic

description: A bundle containing Wii Sports and Wii Sports Resort on a single game disc that was bundled with some Wii consoles.
title: Wii Sports + Wii Sports Resort

description: Wii Chess is a basic chess simulation game. The game has support for single player (playing against a CPU), local 2 player or online multiplayer using Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.
title: Wii Chess
I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here!

description:
This 2 in 1 pack is a compilation released in German speaking countries featuring two Wii titles. They are:

  • My Pet Hotel
  • Pet Vet (possibly not previously released on Wii).
title: 2in1: Meine Tierpension / Meine Tiersprechstunde

description:
Top Trumps Adventures features the gameplay and card packs of:

  • Top Trumps: Dogs & Dinosaurs
  • Top Trumps: Horror & Predators
title: Top Trumps Adventures!

description: JumpStart Get Moving Family Fitness is a collection of fitness, sport, and activity mini-games. The gameplay is lead and narrated by the real-life model and fitness guru, Brooke Burke. Much like other games in the JumpStart series, Get Moving is designed to help players learn. Each mini-game has three difficulty levels and include football, baseball, basketball, volleyball, dodge-ball, and more. Each game can be played in one of 11 different themed locations like a beach, castle, farm, jungle, or even in space.
title: JumpStart Get Moving Family Fitness

description:
ExerBeat is a rhythm-based fitness game in which the player must mirror the moves of the in-game instructors. There is a total of 155 exercises, covering 8 categories: Aerobics, Hip Hop, Latin Dance, Boxercising, Karate, Karate Forms, Yoga/Pilates, and Stretching.

During the exercises, the arrows that appear on screen represent the workout moves to make. The player's accuracy in reproducing the moves is rated as OK, Close, or Miss, with Rhythm Points only awarded for the first one. At the end of an exercise, the results screen will list the Rhythm Points, Longest Combo, Success Rate, Ranking, and will potentially award a Bronze, Silver or Gold medal.

The player is also given the option to create their own personal program based on their workout goals, trouble areas, and workout time.

On top of the exercises themselves, the game provides an "Around The World" mode where the time and Rhythm Points of the workouts are translated into miles. Those miles allow the player's Mii to travel across the world and visit successive cities and landmarks.

The game also includes a set of mini-games that are not strictly related to fitness training: Swimming, Dance Fever, Pizza Toss, Wall Smasher, and Pirate Attack.

Up to two players can exercise alongside each other, each using either a single or two Wii Remotes. The Pirate Attack game requires a Wii Remote Plus or Wii MotionPlus accessory. The Latin Dance exercises support an optional Wii Balance Board.
title: ExerBeat

description:
Wild West Shootout is a shooting gallery game for one or two players, with support for anaglyph 3D mode.

There are four gameplay modes: Tutorial, Story, Wanted and Two Player. Tutorial mode is a target practice mode, where players shoot barrels, crates, jars, pots and other objects. Story mode is the main game. Wanted is a boss rush mode and Two Player is two player mode.

Story mode contains four chapters each broken up in three parts, the chapters are Ranch, Indian Village, Canyon and Western Town. The levels contain typical wild west settings: a barn, a bank, a railroad station, gold mines. In some levels the player is riding on horseback or in a mine cart on rails. There is a double barrel power-up and in some levels the player gets a gatling gun. Throughout the levels there are cows and horses confined by a small wooden fence, shoot the fence to free the animals for bonus points. At certain points in the level, two or more arrows will appear on screen and the player can choose a path by shooting an arrow.

The game had a cartoonish wild west theme and it is generally aimed at children. When enemies are shot they just disappear with a dust cloud and leave a white surrender flag. There are some culturally insensitive depictions of native Americans, featuring cartoonishly big noses and war cries.
title: Wild West Shootout

description:
A compilation that includes:

  • Remington: Great American Bird Hunt
  • Shimano Xtreme Fishing
title: Outdoor Action Double Pack
The Ultimate Battle of the Sexes

description: A special edition release of Shaun White Snowboarding: Road Trip that was sold exclusively at Target. It features the additions of Target Mountain, Target Chalet, extra events, and the ability to play as Shaun White earlier than was possible in the standard version.
title: Shaun White Snowboarding: Road Trip (Target Limited Edition)

description: This comedy platformer spoofs 8-bit platformers from the 80s, taking on games as far-ranging as Super Mario Bros., Atlantis no Nazo and Challenger. Players take the role of Pole the cowboy as he sets out through different 2D platformer stereotype levels to rescue his kidnapped girlfriend, armed with his trusty pistol to shoot enemies from a distance. Each level is littered with weird and surprising gags for players to discover, narrated out loud by a tsukkomi comedian, making the gameplay at least as much about discovering all of the weird things there are to be found as about the actual platforming.
title: Chindōchū!! Pole no Daibōken

description:
The Ultimate Red Ball Challenge is a game based on the British BBC's TV show Total Wipeout, hosted by Richard Hammond, where players attempt to complete obstacle courses. The presenter also hosts this game in FMV live action sequences.

Characters are controlled directly through button presses and wii remote / nunchuk motion movement. Characters are in 3D with cinematic camera angles that constantly change the third-person view. There are six characters to choose from, each with their own traits and personalities. Four are available right away and the remaining two need to be unlocked. The game offers pre-designed shows in the single-player mode and multiplayer games for up to four people. Players can create their custom shows by bringing together different rounds. Several obstacles are unlocked by progressing through the game.
title: The Ultimate Red Ball Challenge

description: In the Mix Featuring Armin van Buuren is a Wii music video game and DJ simulator, and Armin van Buuren's first venture into video games. In the Mix includes more than 60 popular tracks and 30 exclusive remixes by Armin van Buuren and other musicians from his label, Armada Music. With the game's Career Mode, the player can elevate him/herself from underground clubs to stadiums and become a celebrity on an international scale. The game's Studio Mode provides samples and loops so that the player can create and save tracks. These tracks are accessible in Party Mode and can be played around friends.
title: In the Mix Featuring Armin van Buuren

description:
Evasive Space is a 3D action game where the female character Konki's ship needs to be guided through cramped, maze-like environments to fulfil objectives. She is a Stellar Guardian and must regain the Constellation Stones from Dr. Dark Matter and his band of space thieves. Shown using a side view, the game uses an unusual control mechanic: a single button is used to fire the thrusters, while the Wii Remote infrared pointer steers the ship by moving a cursor across the screen. That way the controls are not very precise and a quick succession of thrust and moving the cursor is needed to avoid obstacles. Risks are also encourages as the farther the cursor is removed from the ship, the faster it will travel. The speed of control is also encouraged through the time limit imposed in most missions.

When the ship hits an obstacle or a wall it is stunned briefly and some energy is removed. The ship needs to collect energy cells to restore power and this can be used to charge a system of up three panels of power. Picking up chronosphere items briefly rewinds time to win a few seconds. There are also diodes that can be collected fill and upgrade meter and unlock six different ship upgrades, including an energy shield that protects against damage. Obstacles include crystalline shards, enemy missiles, turrets, black holes and more. There are twenty missions set across four worlds.

Offline multiplayer is supported for up to four people through six game modes. Through the WiFi connection players can compete for the fastest times on the online leaderboards.
title: Evasive Space

description:
A compilation of:

  • Family Party: 30 Great Games
  • Family Party: 30 Great Games - Outdoor Fun
  • Family Party: 30 Great Games - Winter Fun
title: Family Party: 90 Great Games Party Pack

description: A Wii-exclusive sequel of the Crazy Climber series. Instead of the typical two-stick controls of other Crazy Climber titles, it uses motion controls. The only possible moves are to climb upwards, climb sideways or to jump diagonally, instead of the complex limb positioning gameplay of earlier games.
title: Crazy Climber Wii

description:
Fantastic Football Fan Party is a mini-game collection for up to four players. All games are in the settings of playing football and having a big party. It is easy to play for little kids. The player can customize its character and win trophies. The mini-games are:

  • Cheering and Drumming
  • Far kick ball
  • Goal keeper
  • Goal wall shooting
  • Kick balls
  • Play soccer
  • Pump balls
  • Shot goals
  • Sign balls
title: Fantastic Football Fan Party

description: Tron: Evolution - Battle Grids (Championship Edition) is a Toys "R" Us exclusive variant of Tron: Evolution - Battle Grids in the USA that includes an extra 3-wheeled Outrunner vehicle.
title: Tron: Evolution - Battle Grids (Championship Edition)

description: Based on the mascot of the Nekopunch blog, Sukeban Shachou Rena Wii follows the cat CEO Rena and her search for new employees. The candidates? The players, who have to prove themselves by doing whatever she asks of them. These interviews take the form of various action minigames using the Wii remote's motion controls. Players who succeed in passing her exams throughout the course of its main story win the honour of working under Rena.
title: Sukeban Shachou Rena Wii

description:
Ready Steady Cook: The Game is based on a British cooking show in which members of the audience are challenged to prepare a meal using only random recipes and a limited budget. The members are split into two groups. They are the Red Tomatoes and the Green Peppers, each with a celebrity boss to assist them. The viewer then votes on who they think prepared the perfect meal after they've finished cooking it.

The game follows the same format as the show, but there are no celebrity guests, including celebrity chef Ainsley Harriott.
title: Ready Steady Cook: The Game

description: Based on the series of Japanese shorts, The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Rhythm Kei plays similarly to the Rhythm Heaven games, asking players to keep the rhythm as they perform various activities around the town of Turkey's Hill.
title: The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Rhythm Kei

description: Hula Wii is a fitness game themed after hula dancing. Its main mode uses the Wii balance board accessory to track players' movements, though players who don't own a balance board are able to use the Wii remote for hip movement tracking instead. It includes a variety of music for players to dance to, and a two-player mode lets players compete to see who can perform best.
title: Hula Wii: Hula de Hajimeru - Bi to Kenkō!

description: This fitness game has players using the Wii remote controller to hula dance to various songs. Videos of professional hula dancers provide guidance to help players learn. In addition to standard hula dancing, it also features Tahitian dance. A two-player mode lets two players dance together to the same song. Unlike the first game, this entry only supports the Wii remote and doesn't support the balance board.
title: Hula Wii: Tanoshiku Hula o Odorou!!

description: Fullmetal Alchemist: Prince of Dawn offers a twist on the plot that ties in with the manga's original. Players take control of the main protagonists Edward and Alphonse and wander throughout Central City. They converse with people and try to figure out what happened. The gameplay follows a conventional adventure format, with your character moving around a grid of Central City and interacting with others. There are also a few mini-games with different mechanics.
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Prince of the Dawn

description: Fullmetal Alchemist: Daughter of the Dusk is the sequel to Fullmetal Alchemist: Prince of the Dawn. It is very similar to its predecessor in terms of gameplay. It follows the story of two brothers, Edward and Alphonse, who become estranged after a series of bombings and the unexplained disappearance of Prince Claudio. As the tale nears its conclusion, events take unforeseen twists where competing motivations collide.
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Daughter of the Dusk

  • The Pretenders – Brass in Pocket

description:
Downtown Nekketsu Dodgeball follows in the long line of Super Dodge Ball games.

Players control a team of 7 players and attempt to take out the opposing team in three minute matches by throwing a dodgeball at them. Players on the court also have the ability to jump, pass, and catch the ball thrown at them. The field of play is a court divided in half, which each team having four players inside their half of the court, and three players surrounding the outside of their opponent's side of the court. Each player has their own attributes so positioning them correctly goes a long way in trying to win a match.
title: Downtown Nekketsu Dodgeball

description: Ōgon no Kizuna is an action RPG in which players take on the role of Lian, a hero who protects others from monsters. Mechanically speaking, two features stand out: the use of the Wiimote during large enemy encounters, and the emphasis on bonding with other characters across 100 quests. You use the nunchuck to move about, and target enemies by directly pointing with the Wiimote.
title: Ōgon no Kizuna

description:
Based on a series of online and mobile games from the early 2000s, Yetisports: Penguin Party Island is a compilation of nine new minigames, designed to be played with multiple players. The game is only localized for the German-speaking market.

Events can be played as part of a competition or manually chosen. Scores are automatically saved by name and progress can be stored in eight save-slots.

Up to four players can take part in following events, each getting introduced by a small animated intro:

  • Devils Rope: Climb up a rope as quick as possible.Wall Climb: Shoot platforms in a wall and control a penguin to ascend the mountain.

  • Base Jump: Jump from the cliffs, aim for the mountain cave entrance while timing your fall and parachute.

  • Cheese or Freeze: Collect flowers as quick as possible. Stay out of the Yeti’s line-of-sight or you will lose half of your flowers.

  • Wild Water: Drive a raft down a 3D wild water course while avoiding obstacles.

  • Touch Down: Finish a 3D obstacle course in a dense forest riding a pelican.

  • Duel Trampoline: Jump on a trampoline throwing a coconut at a competitor. The harder you hit him, the further he is thrown away and the more points you get.

  • Yeti Paint: Shoot as many paint-balls at the Yeti tied on a rotating board before time runs out.

  • Sandy Sling: Catapult your penguin to a target palm as close as possible.
title: Yeti Sports: Penguin Party Island

description: In Bigfoot: King of Crush multiple monster trucks race each other across courses with environmental hazards, obstacles, and turns of varying degrees, causing collateral damage along the way. The player can do a single race in the Instant Action mode or build up skill and rankings in the Championship mode. There are several designs of monster trucks to choose from, some of them unlockable.
title: Bigfoot: King of Crush
Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt - Trophy Showdown
Basketball Hall of Fame: Ultimate Hoops Challenge
Bass Pro Shops: The Strike - Tournament Edition
The Cages: Pro Style Batting Practice

description:
This special edition contains;

  • LEGO The Lord of the Rings
  • Building Instruction for The Old Forge at Bree
  • An exclusive Lego Batman 2 comic book
title: LEGO The Lord of the Rings

description:
Alien Breed: Obliteration is an open source clone of the Alien Breed fangame of the same name.

Fight through corridor after corridor, finding keys to open doors and progress through increasingly difficult levels, killing hordes of aliens along the way.
title: Alien Breed: Obliteration
Andrew Lloyd Webber Musicals: Sing and Dance

description: Pokers Wii is a unique puzzle game that incorporates elements of poker. Players have a playfield with space for seven hands of poker, three of which start with cards in them. Using the gamepad or a Wii remote, players can swap cards on the playfield with each other. Players can point at cards containing scoring sets of cards via standard poker rules, and those cards will be eliminated. Over time, new hands appear from the bottom of the screen, and the player loses if the screen overflows. In the multiplayer mode, two players compete head to head to see who can last the longest.
title: Pokers Wii

description: The Limited Edition of Sonic Colors comes in a cardboard box and includes a Sonic the Hedgehog figurine as well as three wisps from the game.
title: Sonic Colours (Limited Edition)
Otto Proudly Presents: Karate Phants - Gloves of Glory

description:
Shanghai is a mahjongg solitaire game. It features a few different gameplay modes.

Normal Mode consists of two options. Either playing through a progressive series of boards that consist of more tiles as the player gets further along or playing a single board out of a selection of 104 boards total. Challenge Mode features several time based challenges while a Multiplayer mode offers up to four players to try their hand at mahjong solitaire,
title: Shanghai

description:
Mahjong Taikai Wii is a Riichi mahjong game.

The game features six Mahjong parlors which contain three opponents each of various skill levels to play against. In order to play the more skilled opponents at the top tier parlors, players will need to spend PRIDE, a currency that is earned by playing at the lower ranked parlors. PRIDE is also needed to enter any of the four tournaments that exist.
title: Mahjong Taikai Wii
